name: EpiRust
description: An open source agent-based epidemiology simulation framework built in Rust

SDGs.evidenceText: In early 2019, we started to work towards developing a large-scale, agent-based epidemiological simulation so that a researcher could model an infectious disease spreading through a society and its mitigation strategies via what-if and if-what scenarios, this leads to innovation in the areas of health and well-being.
The application domain of disaster response—in particular epidemic response—has some high-quality computational problems. Epirust is part of an innovative solution.

Collaborating on Epirust has also been converted into another ambitious project called BharatSim that will develop India’s first ultra-large scale agent-based simulation framework for epidemiology, economics and climate change.
